# big east

packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstan)
library(tidybayes)
library(conflicted)
conflict_prefer("extract", "rstan")
conflict_prefer("filter", "dplyr")
conflict_prefer("lag", "dplyr")
conflict_prefer("Position", "ggplot2") 
```

read in big east data

```{r}
big_east <- read_rds("../sportref/big_east_2018.rds")
big_east %>% mutate(res = ifelse(s1>s2, 1, 0)) -> big_east
```

compile model

```{r}
bt <- stan(file = "bt.stan")
```
